com.openxc.measurements

Interface Measurement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcceleratorPedalPosition, AmbientTemp, BaseMeasurement, BatteryVoltage, BrakePedalStatus, EngineCoolTemp, EngineOilTemp, EngineSpeed, EventedMeasurement, FuelConsumed, FuelLevel, HeadlampStatus, HighBeamStatus, IgnitionStatus, IntakeAirTemp, Latitude, Longitude, Odometer, OilPressure, PaddleShifterStatus, ParkingBrakeStatus, ScreenPressX, ScreenPressY, SteeringWheelAngle, TireFLPressure, TireFLStatus, TireFRPressure, TireFRStatus, TireRLPressure, TireRLStatus, TireRRPressure, TireRRStatus, TorqueAtTransmission, TransmissionGearPosition, TurnSignalStatus, VehicleButtonEvent, VehicleDoorStatus, VehicleSpeed, WindshieldWiperStatus

    public interface Measurement
    The Measurement is the base for all OpenXC measurements. A Measurement has at least a value and an age, and optionally a range of valid values.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Measurement.Listener

    • Method Detail

      • getAge

        long getAge()
        Retreive the age of this measurement.
        Returns:
        the age of the data in milliseconds.

      • setTimestamp

        void setTimestamp(long timestamp)
        Set the birth timestamp for this measurement.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the new timestamp, in milliseconds since the epoch.

      • hasRange

        boolean hasRange()
        Determine if this measurement has a valid range.
        Returns:
        true if the measurement has a non-null range.

      • getRange

        Range<? extends Unit> getRange()
        Retrieve the valid range of the measurement.
        Returns:
        the Range of the measurement or null if none.

      • getValue

        Unit getValue()
        Return the value of this measurement.
        Returns:
        The wrapped value (an instance of TheUnit)

      • toVehicleMessage

        SimpleVehicleMessage toVehicleMessage()

      • getBirthtime

        long getBirthtime()
        Return the creation time of this measurement;
        Returns:
        the creation time in milliseconds since the epoch of this measurement.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName(Context context)

      • getGenericName

        java.lang.String getGenericName()

      • getSerializedValue

        java.lang.Object getSerializedValue()
        Return the value of this measurement as a type good for serialization.
        Returns:
        something easily serializable - e.g. String, Double, Boolean.
